tool_description: An API that gives news about different Nintendo games
name: Nintendo News
title: Nintendo News

api_list.name: Get Animal Crossing news from a specific source
api_list.description: let's you select which site do you want to get the news from
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nintendo-news.p.rapidapi.com/animalcrossing/nintendoNews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nintendo-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nintendo-news.p.rapidapi.com/animalcrossing/{siteid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nintendo-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
